actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the payment of overtime to certain personnel employed in the Department of Agriculture, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service.

summary.text: Stipulates that the hourly overtime pay rate for employees of the Department of Agriculture, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service, who occupy nonmanagerial positions at GS-14 or under shall be one and one-half times the hourly rate of basic pay regardless of pay level. Excepts such personnel from limitations on premium pay.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the payment of overtime to certain personnel employed in the Department of Agriculture, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service.
